title: SciPy 1.0: fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python

tldr.text: An overview of the capabilities and development practices of SciPy 1.0 is provided and some recent technical developments are highlighted.

authors.name: Aditya Alessandro Pietro Alex Andreas Andreas Anthony Ant Vijaykumar Bardelli Rothberg Hilboll Kloeckner Sco
